entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -43.7°C
Wind: NW 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
